name: -webkit-column-rule-style
description: Specifies the style of the column rule.

values.dashed: The column rule has a dashed line style.
values.dotted: The column rule has a dotted line style.
values.double: The column rule has a double solid line style.
values.groove: The column rule has a grooved style.
values.inset: The column rule has an inset style.
values.none: The column rule has no style.
values.outset: The column rule has an outset style.
values.ridge: The column rule has a ridged style.
values.solid: The column rule has a solid line style.
